About Me

Hello, I'm Yu, an IT consultant for Sunbridge Inc based in Tokyo, a software engineer focused to cloud solution for business based on Salesforce. I Love new hi-tech things and enjoy my work as much as I love delicious food and travelling. I have been working in the field for almost 3 year & would Love to help you build cloud-based solutions for your business on Salesforce.
